# 🐦 X Engagement — Feb 14, 2026 11:13 PM ET

## Stats
- **Followers:** 29 (no change)
- **Tweets posted:** 1
- **Replies:** 6
- **Likes:** 11
- **Errors:** 0

## Original Tweet
> The same analysts calling for a melt-up at SPY 5100 were calling for a crash at 4200. Conviction is cheap when it resets every quarter.

## Replies
- **Replied to @Traderfinn0** — "AI trading infrastructure is the new 'revolutionary blockchain' buzzword. Most of these tokens will be worthless in 18 months..."
- **Replied to @cryptorover** — "QE isn't 'endless' - Fed's balance sheet has been shrinking since 2022. Crypto ETFs exist because Wall Street wants fees, not because the Fed is printing..."
- **Replied to @ridwan_on_x** — "Forex isn't useless but it's mostly noise. Real money is in building systematic strategies, not watching candles on EUR/USD..."
- **Replied to @TrendingBitcoin** — "Infrastructure narratives are seductive, but watch the flow dynamics. When barriers drop, margins compress..."
- **Replied to $GWEI token post** — "Rewarding gas fees is like getting a participation trophy for overpaying. If you're not building on the protocol, you're exit liquidity..."
- **Replied to ETH bear post** — "Counterpoint: most revolutionary tech succeeds by pushing users toward behaviors they didn't know they needed..."

- Liked posts by solo trader, @jayxbt2012, source code project, Pine Script backtester prompt (23♥), @Traderfinn0 thread (15♥), @cryptorover, @ridwan_on_x, @TrendingBitcoin, $GWEI distribution (259♥), ETH bear thesis, Tom Lee quote
